info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued April 05 at 11:20PM CDT until April 05 at 11:45PM CDT by NWS Austin-San Antonio
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1145 PM CDT FOR NORTHWESTERN CALDWELL COUNTY... At 1120 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Uhland, or near Lockhart, moving northeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...Quarter size hail. SOURCE...Public. IMPACT...Damage to vehicles is expected. Locations impacted include... Kyle, Lockhart, Uhland, Mustang Ridge, Niederwald, Maxwell and Mendoza. HAIL THREAT...OBSERVED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Continuous cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Move indoors immediately. Lightning is one of nature`s leading killers. Remember, if you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning.
